definition: (especially of plants) developed without chlorophyll by being deprived of light, make pale or sickly
details:
adjective
- (especially of plants) developed without chlorophyll by being deprived of light
= example: (especially of plants) developed without chlorophyll by being deprived of light
= synonyms: blanched
verb
- make pale or sickly
= example: make pale or sickly
- bleach and alter the natural development of (a green plant) by excluding sunlight
- make weak by stunting the growth or development of
